Package controller.gameController

Class InfiniteGameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.gameController.GameController
      • controller.gameController.InfiniteGameController
  • public class InfiniteGameController
extends GameController

    InfiniteGameController

    This class extends from NormalGameController and initialises the information demonstration and load the map for infinite game mode. It enables the change of Ends status and the infinite playing terms. It applied ElementFactory to add elements to the scene in order to im[rove the extendability.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.4
    Author:
    Kejia Wu, scykw1@nottingham.ac.uk
    See Also:
    NormalGameController, ElementFactory
